prompts.frontCover:
Humorous and lighthearted birthday card front cover, flat 2D watercolor painting style with flowing colors and soft edges. The scene is a chaotic and funny downhill snowboard race on a snowy mountain under a bright blue sky.

The two main characters are illustrated cartoon versions of Lao Lao and Jordan from the reference photo. Lao Lao, wearing a vibrant snowboard jacket and pants, is in the lead, expertly carving down the slope on her snowboard with a confident, mischievous grin. Snow kicks up playfully behind her board.

Slightly behind her, Jordan is on his own snowboard, but in a comically precarious pose. He's hilariously off-balance, arms flailing, with a wide-eyed, surprised expression as he tries to keep from wiping out. He's holding leashes attached to two very happy and energetic cartoon dogs (e.g., a Golden Retriever and a Corgi) who are gleefully pulling him down the mountain like a sled team, their tongues out and ears flapping in the wind. One dog is wearing a tiny party hat.

The background features soft watercolor pine trees dusted with snow and gentle slopes. Scattered around the scene are subtle birthday elements, like a few colorful balloons tangled in a tree branch and a birthday banner that seems to have been knocked over in the snow.

Centered on the card, in a clear area of the sky between the characters, is the text "Happy Birthday, Lao Lao!" written in a beautiful, readable handwritten cursive script.

REFINEMENT NOTE: A rough draft of this exact image is provided as reference. Create a high-quality final version that:
- Maintains the exact same composition, character positions, and overall design
- Enhances details, textures, and color vibrancy
- Corrects any minor imperfections or artifacts
- Adds professional polish while staying true to the draft
- Think of this as the "final art" version of the provided sketch

ORIGINAL CONTEXT TO MAINTAIN:
- To: Lao Lao
- From: Jordan
- Relationship: Lao Lao is Jordan's girlfriend
- Personal Traits to incorporate: snowboarding and dogs
- Reference photos of: Lao lao on left, jordan on right
prompts.backCover: Minimalist back cover of a greeting card. A full-bleed background of a light blue watercolor sky with soft, wispy white clouds, mimicking the sky from the front cover. In the top left corner, two small, stylized cartoon dogs' paw prints are delicately painted in a darker blue watercolor, as if walking off the edge of the card. The overall design is very clean and simple, with significant negative space. The bottom right corner is intentionally left clear. The artwork is a flat 2D watercolor painting with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds.
prompts.leftInterior: Left interior panel of a greeting card, full-bleed background. A serene watercolor landscape featuring the base of a snowy mountain with a dense forest of pine trees. The trees are painted in varying shades of green and blue, dusted with white snow, creating a sense of depth. The foreground shows untouched, soft white snow with subtle textures. The scene is peaceful and quiet, providing a gentle contrast to the chaotic front cover. No people or animals are present. The artwork is a flat 2D watercolor painting style with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds, matching the card's overall aesthetic.
prompts.rightInterior:
Right interior panel of a greeting card, designed to hold a personal message. The background is a very light, almost white, watercolor wash with subtle hints of soft blue and pale gray, suggesting a misty sky or a clean field of snow. A simple, elegant decorative border element frames the top and bottom of the page. The top border consists of delicate, stylized watercolor pine boughs with a few tiny, colorful dots resembling abstract party confetti scattered lightly. The bottom border is a simple, thin watercolor line that grounds the page. The large central area is left open and clean, providing ample space for handwritten text. The artwork is a flat 2D watercolor painting style with soft flowing colors and artistic brush strokes.

Display this exact text in elegant, clearly readable handwritten script: "To my favorite person, Lao Lao,
Happy Birthday! You're another year older, which means you're officially another year better at putting up with me. Here's to more adventures and me loving you even more.
All my love,
Jordan"
